description: Current awareness and training policy document, including purpose, scope, roles, responsibilities, management commitment, coordination, and compliance requirements
Procedures for implementing awareness and training policy and associated controls
Documentation of the designated official responsible for managing awareness and training policy development and dissemination
Evidence of annual review and update of awareness and training policy and procedures
Security and privacy literacy training materials provided to system users, including managers, senior executives, and contractors
Training completion records for all system users showing initial and annual security and privacy literacy training
Documentation of awareness techniques employed (e.g., posters, email advisories, logon screen messages, awareness events)
Evidence of annual updates to literacy training and awareness content, including incorporation of lessons learned from security or privacy incidents
Insider threat awareness training materials covering recognition and reporting of potential indicators
Social engineering and social mining awareness training materials covering phishing, pretexting, impersonation, and other attack vectors
Role-based security and privacy training materials for personnel with assigned security roles and responsibilities
Training completion records for role-based training showing initial training before system access and annual refresher training
Individual training records retained for five years or five years after completion of specific training programs
Documentation of training content updates following system changes or significant events
List of personnel roles and responsibilities requiring role-based security and privacy training
